name: Persistent-Abbreviations
description:
This was designed for Medical Transcription work. 

Abbreviations can be added dynamically as you go, and will persist. They are also case smart:
If you add an abbreviation such as   
	wrt=with respect to
then a corresponding abbreviation 
	Wrt=With respect to
is also created.
install_details: Add as a plugin in the plugin directory.  ~/.vim/plugin
